sentences.english: Also, cold exposure markedly increased plasma cortisol and plasma catecholamines levels of rats.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷使动物血浆皮质醇和儿茶酚胺含量明显增加。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the role of plasmatic fibrinogen in the pathogenesis of coronary heart disease (CHD).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨血浆纤维蛋白原在冠心病发病中的作用。

sentences.english: Plasma fibrinogen levels were assayed by tissue thromboplastin.
sentences.chinese: 采用组织凝血活酶法测定血浆纤维蛋白原水平。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To develop an HPLC method for the determination of indirubin in rat plasma.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立大鼠血浆中靛玉红浓度的测定方法。

sentences.english: Gradient gel electrophoresis determine small, dense low-density lipoprotein in plasma of patients with coronary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 梯度胶电泳法测定冠心病患者血浆小密低密度脂蛋白。

sentences.english: The plasma sample was directly injected for determination after being deproteinized with perchloric acid.
sentences.chinese: 血浆样品用高氯酸沉淀蛋白后直接进样。

sentences.english: O neg and fresh frozen on the way?
sentences.chinese: 负O型血和新鲜冷冻血浆到了吗？

sentences.english: Finally, the binding rate of plasma protein was determined by trichloroacetic acid precipitation.
sentences.chinese: 最后用三氯醋酸法测定其血浆蛋白结合率。

sentences.english: Drotaverine was well resolved from the plasma constituents and internal standard.
sentences.chinese: 曲他维啉与血浆中其他组分和内标能很好分离。

sentences.english: Sodium fumarate supplementation had no effect on plasma measurements.
sentences.chinese: 补充延胡索酸钠对血浆测定项目没有产生影响。

sentences.english: In wrap restraint stress rats , both defecation and colon transit increased. Guanylin contents in plasma and colon increased too.
sentences.chinese: 束缚应激大鼠血浆及结肠组织中鸟苷素的含量增加。

sentences.english: The content of NO was detected with Griess method.
sentences.chinese: 用硝酸还原酶法检测血浆和脑组织中NO含量。

sentences.english: Conclusion 1L1B elevated plasma level of sulfhydryl compounds.
sentences.chinese: 结论1L1B可提升血浆巯基物质含量。

sentences.english: Radioimmunoassay was used to determine the motilin content in plasma.
sentences.chinese: 本文用放射免疫法测定血浆中的胃动素。

sentences.english: And all subjects' plasma LPA were extracted by means of quantitative inorganic phosphorus.
sentences.chinese: 并采用无机磷定量法提取全部受试者血浆LPA。
